name: music-assistant
description: Music Assistant is a self-hosted music management and streaming platform that integrates with Home Assistant. It pulls media from services like Spotify or local libraries into structured playlists and collections.

features.title: Home Assistant Integration
features.description: Control playback on smart speakers and devices through Home Assistant automations

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Create and sync playlists across different music sources with automatic metadata matching

features.title: Library Organization
features.description: Browse music by artist, album, genre, or playlist with automatic metadata enrichment

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Build dynamic playback queues mixing tracks from different sources and services seamlessly

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Cache music locally for playback without internet connection or streaming service availability
